name: Figure it Out
description: timezones of your choosing in every new tab screen.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-eval' https://www.google-analytics.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.googleapis.com https://js.stripe.com https://fioapp.co; object-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
